column2: both times we averaged at about $100 a person for food and wine
column4: enough food for me to walk away stuffed! I think it all boils down to either A) knowing the menu and what to order or B) Having complete faith in your server to lead you into a cohesive
column5: multi-course meal that'll cater to your cravings - whether you knew you had one or not. For social hour (4:30-6pm)
column6: you'll spend half the amount of money
column7: so for those complaining about the price
column8: there's a special 1.5 hours just for you!
